infos.value: It looks like they fell for your plan, Lord Mont.
Right. Now we can buy time to rally our troops.
Shall we retreat...? Or shall we take this opportunity to launch an assault?
«Rubeus» will surely come to our aid.
Margritte hoped to see us join Glaciela's cause once the fortress was toppled.
Just as we need their help, they need ours. That's why...
Moreover, the enemy is retreating. We must press the advantage while we have it.
